subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /LC's FM Spirit Box Prototype/ifyouarehurttellus_I_NEED_HELP.wav 
  Uploaded by : lcdupla <lcdupla@...> 
  Description : Recorded in a bar at the upstairs doorway.  Was formerly a house of ill-repute.  Question: If you are hurt, tell us.   Answer: I need help. 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/LC%27s%20FM%20Spirit%20Box%20Prototype/ifyouarehurttellus_I_NEED_HELP.wav 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

lcdupla <lcdupla@...>
